seg.source: Musik-Contest im Kulturbahnhof: Die "Kö von Hiltrup" und der See
seg.translation: Music contest at the culture train station: The "Kö von Hiltrup" and the sea
Music Contest in Kulturbahnhof: the "Kö von Hiltrup" and the Lake
Music contest at the Kulturbahnhof: The "Kö von Hiltrup" and the lake

seg.source: Der erste Aufruf zum Musikcontest war ein Erfolg, kreativ und im Miteinander.
seg.translation: The first call to participate in the music contest was a success, creative and cooperative.
The first call for a music contest was a success for creative reasons and to bring people together.
The first call for the music contest was a success, creatively and in cooperation.

seg.source: " D ein Lied für Hiltrup" darzubieten, lautet der Appell der Stadtteiloffensive Hiltrup, im "Musikcontest für große und kleine, junge und erfahrene Musiker".
seg.translation: Your Song for Hiltrup is the motto of the Hiltrup initiative for the "Music Contest for young and old, new and experienced musicians."
Reading "Your Song for Hiltrup" the appeal from Hiltrup's neighborhood campaign reached out for a "music contest for big and small, as well as experienced and inexperienced musicians".
"D is a song for Hiltrup," is the appeal of the district offensive Hiltrup, in the "music contest for big and small, young and experienced musicians."

seg.source: Ein Contest "mit Augenzwinkern in der sympathischen Hiltruper Familie", wie Karl Franke formulierte.
seg.translation: A contest "with a wink from the lovely Hiltrup family", as Karl Franke worded it.
A contest "with a nod in the direction of the friendly Hiltrup family," as it was formulated by Karl Franke.
A contest "with a wink in the sympathetic Hiltruper family," as Karl Franke put it.

seg.source: Tatsächlich war es bald ein familiäres Miteinander bei Kaffee und Kuchen von den Ehrenamtlichen des Kulturbahnhofs.
seg.translation: In fact, it soon became a familial togetherness with coffee and cake from the volunteers of the Kulturbahnhof.
Actually, it would almost be like a family get together with coffee and cake provided by volunteers from the Kulturbahnhof.
In fact, it was soon a family get-together with coffee and cake from the volunteers of the Kulturbahnhof.

seg.source: Sieben Formationen traten an, von der Ein-Mann-Band bis zum großen Ensemble: Alvin Jasic mit Pianist Marcel Untied, Henk Humberg mit Gitarre, Rolf Ihmig, ein lange in Hiltrup lebender Albachtener, die Neun von den "Hiltruper Sternfarben", drei Mitglieder und drei Generationen der Familien Trenkamp und Claus, ein Ensemble aus dem Kindergarten Lummerland und schließlich Rike Weßling und die Zwarties.
seg.translation: Seven acts performed, from a one-man band to the big ensemble: Alvin Jasic with pianist Marcel Untied, Henk Humberg with his guitar, Rolf Ihmig, an old-established Hiltrup man, the "Hiltruper Sternfarben", three members from three generations of the Trenkamp and Claus families, an ensemble from the kindergarten Lummerland and finally Rike Weßling und die Zwarties.

Seven formation of musicians will perform, from a one-man band to a huge ensemble: Alvin Jasic with Pianist Marcel Untied, Henk Humberg with his guitar, longtime Hiltrup local Rolf Ihmig (originally from Albachten), the nine from the "Hiltrup Starcolors", 3 members and 3 generations of the Trenkamp and Claus family, an ensemble from the Lummerland Kindergarden and finally Rike Weßling and the Zwarties.

Seven groups competed, from the one-man band to the large ensemble: Alvin Jasic with pianist Marcel Untied, Henk Humberg with guitar, Rolf Ihmig, an Albachtener who lived for a long time in Hiltrup, the nine from the "Hiltruper Sternfarben," three members and three generations of the Trenkamp and Claus families, an ensemble from the kindergarten Lummerland and finally Rike Weßling and the Zwarties.

seg.source: Dieser Contest, so erklärte Bezirksbürgermeister Joachim Schmidt, sei eine Neuheit.
seg.translation: This contest is a novelty, explains district mayor Joachim Schmidt.
This contest, as district mayor Joachim Schmidt explained, should be a new feature.
This contest, declared district mayor Joachim Schmidt, is a novelty.

seg.source: Das haben wir in anderen Stadtteilen noch nicht erlebt.
seg.translation: We have not seen something like this in other districts.
We have never experienced such a thing in other neighborhoods.
We haven't seen that in other parts of the city.

seg.source: Womit sahen sich die Texter verbunden?
seg.translation: What did the songwriters sing about?
How are the lyricists connected to each other?
What did the copywriters see themselves associated with?

seg.source: Bei den Orten fanden der Hiltruper See und die Marktallee besonders häufig Erwähnung.
seg.translation: Particularly popular places were the Hiltrup lake and Marktallee.
Of all the locations, Lake Hiltruper and the Market Promenade are most often mentioned.
With the places the Hiltruper lake and the Marktallee were mentioned particularly frequently.

seg.source: Rolf Ihmig kürte die Allee in seinem schlagerartigen Lied zur "Kö von Hiltrup".
seg.translation: Rolf Ihmig dedicated the song to the avenue Marktalle in his folk-like song "Kö von Hiltrup".
Rolf Ihmig shortened the name of the promenade in his Schlager song "Kö von Hiltrup".
Rolf Ihmig named the avenue "Kö von Hiltrup" in his hit-like song.

seg.source: Auch der Kulturbahnhof wurde gewürdigt.
seg.translation: The Kulturbahnhof was also mentioned.
Also the Kulturbahnhof was appreciated.
The Kulturbahnhof was also honoured.

seg.source: Immer wieder ging es um das Erleben von Miteinander an diesen Orten, besonders bei Alvin Jasic.
seg.translation: Over and over again, the acts sang about experiencing togetherness in these places, especially Alvin Jasic.
Again and again it had to do with the way people experienced each other at the various locations, particularly Alvin Jasic.
Again and again, it was about experiencing togetherness in these places, especially with Alvin Jasic.

seg.source: Karl Franke belebte die kurzen Umbaupausen mit Kurz-Interviews mit den Interpreten oder Hinweisen zu ihrem Schaffen.
seg.translation: Karl Franke led the audience through the breaks with short interviews with the performers or some information about the artists.
When they were changing from one band to the next, Karl Franke kept the short breaks lively by talking with the performers about their work.
Karl Franke animated the short breaks with short interviews with the performers or hints about their work.

seg.source: So erfuhr man von Humberg, dass er eigentlich Chemie studiert habe, jetzt aber auch Gitarre unterrichte.
seg.translation: Thus, the audience learnt that Humberg that he had actually studied chemistry, but now also teaches guitar.
That was how the audience found out about Humber and how he actually used to study chemistry, even though he now gives guitar lessons.
So it was learned from Humberg that he had actually studied chemistry, but now also teaches guitar.

seg.source: Vom Tontechniker Stefan Schemmelmann wusste Franke zu berichten, dass der jüngst in Ludwigshafen auftrat - auf einer großen Veranstaltung der BASF mit Barclay James Harvest im Programm.
seg.translation: From the sound engineer Stefan Schemmelmann Franke reported that he had recently performed in Ludwigshafen - at a major BASF event with Barclay James Harvest as a main act.
Franke could report that sound engineer Stefan Schemmelmann had most recently performed in Ludwigshafen on the program with Barclay James Harvest at a large BASF event.
Franke reported from the sound engineer Stefan Schemmelmann that he had recently performed in Ludwigshafen - at a major BASF event with Barclay James Harvest in the programme.

seg.source: Und Alvin Jasic hat unterdessen allerhand auf Youtube platziert.
seg.translation: And Alvin Jasic has uploaded a lot of YouTube videos.
Meanwhile Alvin Jasic posted multiple times on YouTube.
And Alvin Jasic, meanwhile, has put all sorts of things on YouTube.

seg.source: "Es geht nicht ums Gewinnen", hatte Franke gesagt.
seg.translation: It’s not about winning, Franke had said.
"It doesn't have to do with winning," said Franke.
"It's not about winning," Franke had said.

seg.source: Tatsächlich bekamen alle Teilnehmer ein Geschenk aus der Hiltruper Gastronomie.
seg.translation: In fact, all participants received a gift from Hiltrup catering businesses.
All participants actually received a gift from the Hiltrup gastronomy.
In fact, all participants received a gift from the Hiltruper catering trade.

seg.source: Für die Favoriten der Jury gab es dennoch etwas Besonderes - damit auch andere ihre Songs hören können.
seg.translation: For the jury's favorites there was something special - so that others could also hear their songs.
For the jury's favorites, there was still something special - that more people could also hear their music.
Still, there was something special for the judges "favorites - so that others could hear their songs, too.

seg.source: Eine ganze CD können Alvin Jasic und sein Pianist Marcel Untied mit Tontechniker Schemmelmann einspielen.
seg.translation: Alvin Jasic and his pianist Marcel Untied can record an entire CD with sound technician Schemmelmann.
Sound engineer Schemmelmann put on an entire CD by Alvin Jasic and his pianist Marcel Untied.
An entire CD can be recorded by Alvin Jasic and his pianist Marcel Untied with sound engineer Schemmelmann.

seg.source: Weitere Musiker können ein Lied aufnehmen: Ihmig mit seinem Hiltrup-Schlager, der Franke besonders mit seiner Musikalität beeindruckte, und das "Lummerland-Rudel": "ein sehr schöner Auftritt" mit zehn Kindern und zwei Erzieherinnen an Gitarre und Cajon, Laura Kastner und Lina Tölle.
seg.translation: Other musicians can record a song: Ihmig with his Hiltrup hit, which especially impressed Franke with his musicality, and the “Lummerland pack:” “a very good performance” with ten children and two teachers on guitar and cajón, Laura Kastner and Lina Tölle.

Various additional musicians recorded a song: Ihmig with his Hiltrup Schlager, whose musicality particularly impressed Franke, as well the "Lummerland-Rudel": "a very beautiful performance" with ten children and their two teachers, Laura Kastner and Lina Tölle, playing guitar and cajon.

Other musicians can record a song: Ihmig with his Hiltrup hit, which particularly impressed Franke with its musicality, and the "Lummerland pack": "a very nice performance" with ten children and two kindergarten teachers on guitar and cajon, Laura Kastner and Lina Tölle.

seg.source: Wie alle traten auch die Kinder zum Finale noch einmal auf - und klangen sogar ohne elektronische Unterstützung "richtig gut", wie Franke sagte.
seg.translation: Like everyone else, the children also performed again for the finals - and even without electronic support, they sounded "really good," Franke said.
Like all of the others, the children performed one last time in the finale - even without electronic accompaniment, they sounded, "really good", according to Franke.
Like everyone else, the children performed again for the finale - and even without electronic support, they sounded "really good," as Franke said.

seg.source: Leiten ließ sich die Jury von den Aspekten Originalität, Bezug zu Hiltrup, Eingängigkeit der Melodie und Wiedererkennungswert.
seg.translation: The jury was guided by the aspects of originality, reference to Hiltrup, catchiness of the melody and recognition value.
The jury judged performers on aspects of originality, their connection to Hiltrup, as well as how catchy and memorable their melodies were.
The jury was guided by the aspects of originality, reference to Hiltrup, catchiness of the melody and recognition value.

seg.source: Der Jury gehörten Gisbert Keller von der Westfälischen Schule für Musik, Andreas Klomfaß vom KvG-Gymnasium und Oliver Ahlers vom Wirtschaftsverbund sowie Jan Kaven, Vorsitzender der Stadtteiloffensive, an.
seg.translation: The jury included Gisbert Keller from the Westphalian School of Music, Andreas Klomfaß from KvG-Gymnasium and Oliver Ahlers from the Trade Association as well as Jan Kaven, chairman of the district offensive.
On the jury sat the Westphalian Music School's Gisbert Keller, the KvG Gymnasium's Andreas Klomfaß and the trade association's Oliver Ahlers, as well as head of the neighborhood campaign's Jan Kaven.

The jury consisted of Gisbert Keller from the Westphalian School of Music, Andreas Klomfaß from the KvG-Gymnasium and Oliver Ahlers from the Wirtschaftsverbund, as well as Jan Kaven, chairman of the district offensive.

seg.source: Die Stadtteiloffensive hatte das Ereignis aus Anlass ihres zehnjährigen Bestehens ins Leben gerufen.
seg.translation: The district offensive launched the event on the occasion of its ten-year anniversary.
The neighborhood campaign used the even to mark the occasion of the ten year founding of the organization.
The district offensive had brought the event to life on the occasion of its ten-year anniversary.

seg.source: Sie wertete das Event als vollen Erfolg.
seg.translation: They considered the event a complete success.
They saw the event as a complete success.
She rated the event as a complete success.

seg.source: Alle seien "sehr zufrieden", und "die Atmosphäre war gut" im bald sehr vollen Kulturbahnhof.
seg.translation: Everyone was "very satisfied," and "the atmosphere was good" in the very crowded Kulturbahnhof.
Everyone was "very satisfied" and "the atmosphere was good" in the nearly full Kulturbahnhof.
Everyone was "very satisfied," and "the atmosphere was good" in the soon-to-be very crowded Kulturbahnhof.
